text:
Venture Research Inc. | Plano, TX (DFW) | Onsite | http://www.ventureresearch.com

Venture Research is a leader in the RFID industry and is consistently pushing the leading edge of what is possible using RFID. We have a variety of opportunities available for both fast-paced new product design and development and for development on some of our long-term stable products as well. 17 year old growing company, privately held, with excellent benefits, 401K matching, paid health insurance and highly competitive salary and bonus structure.

We are hiring for the following positions:

- Senior .NET / Web developer: C#, VB.Net, ASP.NET, MSSQL, Oracle, JavaScript and JQuery. .NET MVC and Python is a plus.

- Embedded platforms engineer: C, Linux, Android NDK. Experience with hardware co-design, QT, Django, React a plus.

- Embedded firmware engineer: microcontroller development using primarily Freescale Kinetis parts and the Freescale MQX RTOS.

Please email resumes to hr@ventureresearch.com, or use the email in my profile.
